finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Tools for personal finance, loans, investments, and taxes.
finance.metaDescription: Explore a complete suite of calculators to manage your finances, loans, and investments effectively.

faqs.q: What are financial calculators used for?
faqs.a: They help estimate payments, interest, and returns for better decision-making.
Calculations are based on standard formulas, but always consult a professional.

loans-mortgages.title: Loans & Mortgages
loans-mortgages.metaDescription: Find out your mortgage payments, loan limits, refinancing options and more.

faqs.q: How do I calculate my mortgage?
faqs.a: Use our Mortgage Payment Calculator with loan amount, term, and interest rate.

mortgage-payment.title: Mortgage Payment
mortgage-payment.description: Estimate monthly mortgage payments based on loan amount, rate, and term.
mortgage-payment.metaDescription: Easily estimate your monthly home loan payments with our mortgage calculator.

faqs.q: Does this calculator include taxes and insurance?
faqs.a: No, it only calculates principal and interest. Add taxes and insurance separately.
